item.title: The AI unicorns that will soar, stagnate, and fall over the next few years, according to readers
item.description: Fortune asked readers to make some predictions about what the next few years will hold for the buzziest companies in AI.

item.title: Your pantry can reveal your age, social circle, and even how confident you might be feeling about the economy
item.description: It turns out taking a peek in your pantry can say a lot about you.

item.title: Here’s what’s open (and closed) on Good Friday 2025
item.description: Wall Street has a day off. Bankers (generally) don't.

item.title: A Hilton benefits program employees used to hate now makes millions in revenue for the company
item.description: Team member rates include up to 40 nights per year, and the majority of hotels are priced at tiered flat rates, ranging from $40 to $80 per night.
